import React from 'react'; import { AppBar, Flex, Card, Button, IconButton, Center, Box, Divider, Typography, css, Avatar, Dialog, Backdrop, List, Snackbar, Spacer, Stack, Paper, Frame, TextBox, Switch,Chip, useComponentState, } from './components/UI'; import useApp from './hooks/useApp'; import { ChevronRight } from './icons'; import { Smiley, Play, Github, Search, Lock, Dribble,SkipBack,SkipFwd } from './icons'; import './style.css'; export default function App() { const { search } = useApp() const {state, toggle, setState} = useComponentState({open: !1, c1: !0, c2: !0, c3: !0}); const { open, param, results, c1, c2, c3 } = state; return (
Rachet-UI window.open('http://docs.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Docs window.open('http://sql.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Ratchet-SQL window.open('http://sql.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Stackblitz toggle('open')} align="center" className="search-box"> Search... Ctrl+K window.open('https://github.com/miltonejones/rachet-react-ui')} mr={16} ml={2} size="small"> The React Component Library literally nobody asked for. Ratchet-UI provides a light-weight, customizable, and open-source library of component starter classes, enabling you to create the framework you need for your application. Demons hayley kiyoko
puma mammal species Alternate titles: American lion, Felis concolor, Mexican lion, Puma concolor, catamount, cougar, mountain lion Related subjects Check security status Check the Storybook to learn more about our components and tools a Hatsune Miku wedding confirmed Rumors of Donald Duck lawsu... setState('c1', b)} checked={c1} color="success" /> setState('c2', b)} checked={c2} color="warning" /> setState('c3', b)} checked={c3} color="error" /> To-do List} items={['apples', 'pears', 'oranges', 'world peace'].map(x=>{x})} /> toggle('open')} open={open} width="500px" height="500px"> Search the component list setState('results', search(v.target.value))} /> {!!results && ( Results from the Ratchet-UI Documentation ( linkOf(b)} mt={2} mb={2} > {b} ))} /> )}
); } // https://docs.ratchet-ui.com/?path=/docs/components-data-display--avatar const linkOf = (desc) => { const array = desc.split(':') const cat = array[0].trim().replace(/\s/g, '-') const com = array[1].trim().replace(/\s/g, '-') const uri = `https://docs.ratchet-ui.com/?path=/docs/components-${cat}--${com}`; window.open(uri) };
